sentences: Mehed tõstsid rõõmukisa: „Lähme, näitame pappidele tuld põrguteele! Aitame kirikuhakkidel kloostri suitsus taevasse lennata ..”
Kas sa näitate kõiki eksponeeritud esemeid?
context: The word 'näitame' is the first person plural present tense form of the Estonian verb 'näidata', which means 'to show'. It is used when a group of people (including the speaker) are showing or presenting something to others. In the example from literature, it appears in an exclamation where men are expressing their intention to show priests fire on the road to hell, meaning they want to demonstrate hostility or attack them.
